title: astype
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : astype**

astype is the font label of [Andreas Seidel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andreas%20Seidel), Germany.

**External Links**  
 [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/www.astype.de/)  
 [astype on MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/new.myfonts.com/foundry/astype/)

Fonts in the astype library include [ADANA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ADANA), [CRAYFISH](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/CRAYFISH), [GRACIA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/GRACIA), [HERAUT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/HERAUT), [MISSALE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MISSALE), [PAOLA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PAOLA), [SATTLER](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SATTLER), [SIMEON](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SIMEON), [SECCA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SECCA), [SVEVA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SVEVA), [TOSHNA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TOSHNA) and the very known [Astype Ornaments](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Astype%20Ornaments).
author: andreas
